title: National Hockey League - Chicago Blackhawks home attendance 2005 to 2019
summary: Overall Home attendance has decreased over the Year.
Home attendance is slightly decreasing from 2013/!4 to 2014/15, and lastly roughly constant from 2014/15 to 2017/18.
Maximum Home attendance, about 927545.0 was reported at Year 2013/!4
Minimum Home attendance about 887794.0 was reached at Year 2017/18
min_summary: Overall Home attendance has decreased over the Year.
mid_summary: In general Home attendance has stayed the same over the Year.
Home attendance is slightly decreasing from 2013/!4 to 2014/15, and lastly roughly constant from 2014/15 to 2017/18.
